colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @046B (THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI BYANG CHUB LAM RIM DMAR KHRID KYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA, ^KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS DPAL BZANG POS, CHOS SDE CHEN PO DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI MKHAS GRUB 'DUS SDE RIN PO CHE LA LEGS PAR BSTZAL TSE, PHRAN BA GY BA'I SPRUL SKU NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG POS BLOR ZIN BRIS BTAB PAS, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU RGYAS PAR BYED PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
